CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( lundi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 -VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( lundi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 <= VALUE(TEXT( Duree_pause_dejeuner_en_h__c )), VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mardi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 -VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mardi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 <= VALUE(TEXT( Duree_pause_dejeuner_en_h__c )), VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mercredi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 -VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( mercredi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 <= VALUE(TEXT( Duree_pause_dejeuner_en_h__c )), VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( jeudi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 -VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( jeudi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 <= VALUE(TEXT( Duree_pause_dejeuner_en_h__c )), VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( vendredi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 -VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( vendredi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 <= VALUE(TEXT( Duree_pause_dejeuner_en_h__c )), VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( samedi_fin_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 -VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( samedi_debut_pause_dejeuner__c), ':', ''))/100 <= VALUE(TEXT( Duree_pause_dejeuner_en_h__c )) ),
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red") )
CustomField.label: Durée pause déjeuner respectée
